commodities.tests
Class RecommendationAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      commodities.tests.RecommendationAnalyzer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
class RecommendationAnalyzer
extends Thread

RecommendationAnalyzer is a threaded check of recommendations for contracts.

Version:
1.0
Author:
J.R. Titko
Updated:
2004.11.11

RecommendationAnalyzer

public RecommendationAnalyzer(Map testMap,
                              Contract contract,
                              int term)
Create a recommendation analyzer for a contract and term.

Parameters:
testMap - a map of test names and class names
contract - the contract to get the recommendation for
term - short, medium, or long term recommendation
